x:Key="BooleanToVisibilityConverter"/> </Page.Resources> <DockPanel> <StackPanel DockPanel.Dock="Top"> <Grid> <Button HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="100" Name="BackButton" </Paragraph> <!--TODO: Expand this in the future to allow for multiple Partners, or no partner.--> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Husband/Boyfriend"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>First Name:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="38*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="59*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Label>Middle Name:</Label> <TextBox Grid.ColumnSpan="2" Margin="0,5,5,5"/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Last Name:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Birthday:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Living together?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Is he supportive?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Working?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="IsWorking">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Work Location:</Label> <TextBox IsEnabled="{Binding ElementName=IsWorking, Path=IsChecked}"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Transportation"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Driver's License:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Access to Transportation:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Smoking"> <Grid> <Label>Do you smoke?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Church"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Attend Church:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="AttendChurch">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Visibility="{Binding ElementName=AttendChurch, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>Church Name:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Pregnancy Information" Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Are you pregnant today?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="IsPregnant">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="NotSureIfPregnant">Not Sure</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=NotSureIfPregnant, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Would you like to take a pregnancy test?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="WantsPregnancyTest">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Visibility="{Binding ElementName=WantsPregnancyTest, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>Results:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Pregnant</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Not Pregnant</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> <!--If pregnant, these inputs will need to create a new Pregnancy item --> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=IsPregnant, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>First Pregnancy?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>How far along?</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Due Date:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Gender:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Male</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Female</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Intentions:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem>Plan To Parent</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Adoption</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Abortion</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Undecided</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Planned:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem>Yes</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Unplanned and Upsetting at First</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Unplanned but Happy About It</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Were you on birth control?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Has pregnancy been verified?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Taking Prenatal Vitamin:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Pregnancy History"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Carried to Term:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Miscarriage:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Abortion:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Adoption:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Healthcare and Services" Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Medical Insurance:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>OB Doctor:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Pediatrician:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Children Recieving Healthcare:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> <RadioButton>N/A</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>WIC:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>HUGS:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="HugsNurse">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Visibility="{Binding ElementName=HugsNurse, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>HUGS Nurse:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Food Stamps:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Families First:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Life Bridge Program/FSS:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Child Care Situation:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Do any of your children have disabilities?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Children" Width="475"> <ScrollViewer> <StackPanel x:Name="ChildContainer"> <Button x:Name="AddChildButton" Width="100" Click="AddChildButton_Click">Add Child</Button> </StackPanel> </ScrollViewer> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Housing"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <ComboBox x:Name="HousingLocation"> <ComboBoxItem>Own Home</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Rent Apt/Home (Not Government Housing)</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Government Housing</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Section 8 Housing</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Parents</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Relative</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Boyfriend</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Boyfriend's Family</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Friend</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Different People at Different Times</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Homeless</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem Tag="OtherHousing">Other</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Grid.Style> <Style> <Setter Property="Label.Visibility" Value="Collapsed"></Setter> <Style.Triggers> <DataTrigger Binding="{Binding ElementName=HousingLocation, Path=SelectedItem.Tag}" Value="OtherHousing"> <Setter Property="Label.Visibility" Value="Visible"></Setter> </DataTrigger> </Style.Triggers> </Style> </Grid.Style> <Label>Specify Housing:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Education" Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Education Level:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="College">College</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="HighSchool">High School</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="GED">GED</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="OtherEdu">Other</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=College, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Status:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="Attending">Currently Enrolled</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="NotStarted">Enrolled but Not Started</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="SomeCollege">Some College</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="Graduated">Graduated</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="OtherCollege">Other</ComboBoxItem> x:Name="OtherCollege">Other</RadioButton> </StackPanel>--> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=Attending, Path=IsSelected, <RadioButton>Sophomore</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Junior</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Senior</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Year Started:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> Visibility="{Binding ElementName=SomeCollege, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Year Started:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Years Completed:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Degree Pursuing:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=Graduated, Path=IsSelected, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Grade Level:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem>Freshman</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Sophomore</ComboBoxItem> Visibility="{Binding ElementName=DropOut, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Dropout Grade:</Label> <ComboBox> BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Graduation Date:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=OtherHS, Path=IsSelected, </StackPanel> </StackPanel>
<StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=GED, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Status:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem Visibility="{Binding ElementName=HaveGED, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Date Earned:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=PursuingGED, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Comments:</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=OtherEdu, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Description:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="TechSchool">Technical School</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="TrainingSchool">Training School</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="Online">Online</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Other</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Comments:</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid>
<Grid> <Label>Hours per week:</Label> <!--See if there is a number scroll input box??--> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Making livable wage?:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Start Date:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=ClientNotWorking, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Last Time Employed:</Label> <!-- End date --> <DatePicker/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Willing to Pursue Work:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Comments</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Disability"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>On Disability:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="IsNotOnDisability">No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Visibility="{Binding ElementName=IsNotOnDisability, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>Applying For Disability:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <Border Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>How did you hear about us?</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Can we contact you after today?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Staff Conducting Intake:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </Border> </Paragraph> </FlowDocument> </FlowDocumentPageViewer> </DockPanel>.../>

Different Times</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Homeless</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem Tag="OtherHousing">Other</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Grid.Style> <Style> <Setter Property="Label.Visibility" Value="Collapsed"></Setter> <Style.Triggers> <DataTrigger Binding="{Binding ElementName=HousingLocation, Path=SelectedItem.Tag}" Value="OtherHousing"> <Setter Property="Label.Visibility" Value="Visible"></Setter> </DataTrigger> </Style.Triggers> </Style> </Grid.Style> <Label>Specify Housing:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Education" Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Education Level:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="College">College</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="HighSchool">High School</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="GED">GED</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="OtherEdu">Other</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=College, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Status:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="Attending">Currently Enrolled</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="NotStarted">Enrolled but Not Started</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="SomeCollege">Some College</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="Graduated">Graduated</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="OtherCollege">Other</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> <!-- Radio buttons instead of combo box <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Center" Orientation="Vertical"> <RadioButton x:Name="Attending">Currently Enrolled</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="NotStarted">Enrolled but Not Started</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="SomeCollege">Some College</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="Graduated">Graduated</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="OtherCollege">Other</RadioButton> </StackPanel>--> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=Attending, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Year:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Freshman</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Sophomore</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Junior</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Senior</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Year Started:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Years Completed:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Degree Pursuing:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=NotStarted, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Year Started:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Degree Pursuing:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=SomeCollege, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Year Started:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Years Completed:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Degree Pursuing:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=Graduated, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Degree:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Associate's</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Bachelor's</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Master's</RadioButton> </StackPanel> <!--TODO: maybe add a field to input the major I.E.(Computer Science)--> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=OtherCollege, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Comments:</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=HighSchool, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Status:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="AttendingHS">Currently Enrolled</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="DropOut">Dropped Out</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="GraduatedHS">Graduated</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="OtherHS">Other</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=AttendingHS, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Grade Level:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem>Freshman</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Sophomore</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Junior</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Senior</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> <!-- Radio Button Alternative for Dropout Grade: <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Freshman</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Sophomore</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Junior</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Senior</RadioButton> </StackPanel>--> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=DropOut, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Dropout Grade:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem>Freshman</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Sophomore</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Junior</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Senior</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> <!-- Radio Button Alternative for Dropout Grade: <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Freshman</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Sophomore</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Junior</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Senior</RadioButton> </StackPanel>--> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=GraduatedHS, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Graduation Date:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=OtherHS, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Comments:</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </StackPanel>
<StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=GED, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Status:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="HaveGED">Have GED</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="PursuingGED">Pursuing GED</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="OtherGED">Other</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=HaveGED, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Date Earned:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=PursuingGED, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Comments:</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=OtherEdu, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Description:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="TechSchool">Technical School</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="TrainingSchool">Training School</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem x:Name="Online">Online</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Other</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Comments:</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Employment" Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Working?:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="ClientWorking">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="ClientNotWorking">No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=ClientWorking, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <!--TODO: Maybe make this its own page asking for employer address.--> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid>
<Grid> <Label>Hours per week:</Label> <!--See if there is a number scroll input box??--> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Making livable wage?:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Start Date:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=ClientNotWorking, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Last Time Employed:</Label> <!-- End date --> <DatePicker/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Willing to Pursue Work:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Comments</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Disability"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>On Disability:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="IsNotOnDisability">No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Visibility="{Binding ElementName=IsNotOnDisability, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>Applying For Disability:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <Border Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>How did you hear about us?</Label> <TextBox Height="125" AcceptsReturn="True" ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Visible"/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Have you recieved services from us in the past?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Can we contact you after today?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Staff Conducting Intake:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </Border> </Paragraph>.../>

ElementName=AttendChurch, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>Church Name:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Pregnancy Information" Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Are you pregnant today?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Work Location:</Label> <TextBox IsEnabled="{Binding ElementName=IsWorking, Path=IsChecked}"/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Transportation"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Driver's License:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Access to Transportation:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Smoking"> <Grid> <Label>Do you smoke?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Church"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Attend Church:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="AttendChurch">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Visibility="{Binding ElementName=AttendChurch, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>Church Name:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Pregnancy Information" Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Are you pregnant today?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="IsPregnant">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> <RadioButton x:Name="NotSureIfPregnant">Not Sure</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=NotSureIfPregnant, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Would you like to take a pregnancy test?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="WantsPregnancyTest">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Visibility="{Binding ElementName=WantsPregnancyTest, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>Results:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Pregnant</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Not Pregnant</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> <!--If pregnant, these inputs will need to create a new Pregnancy item --> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=IsPregnant, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>First Pregnancy?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>How far along?</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Due Date:</Label> <DatePicker/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Gender:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Male</RadioButton> <RadioButton>Female</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Intentions:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem>Plan To Parent</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Adoption</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Abortion</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Undecided</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Planned:</Label> <ComboBox> <ComboBoxItem>Yes</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Unplanned and Upsetting at First</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Unplanned but Happy About It</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Were you on birth control?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Has pregnancy been verified?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Taking Prenatal Vitamin:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Pregnancy History"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Carried to Term:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Miscarriage:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Abortion:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Adoption:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Healthcare and Services" Width="475"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Medical Insurance:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>OB Doctor:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Pediatrician:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Children Recieving Healthcare:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> <RadioButton>N/A</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>WIC:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>HUGS:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton x:Name="HugsNurse">Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid Visibility="{Binding ElementName=HugsNurse, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Label>HUGS Nurse:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Food Stamps:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Families First:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Life Bridge Program/FSS:</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Child Care Situation:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Do any of your children have disabilities?</Label> <StackPanel HorizontalAlignment="Right" Orientation="Horizontal"> <RadioButton>Yes</RadioButton> <RadioButton>No</RadioButton> </StackPanel> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Children" Width="475"> <ScrollViewer> <StackPanel x:Name="ChildContainer"> <Button x:Name="AddChildButton" Width="100" Click="AddChildButton_Click">Add Child</Button> </StackPanel> </ScrollViewer> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> <Paragraph> <GroupBox Header="Housing"> <StackPanel> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <ComboBox x:Name="HousingLocation"> <ComboBoxItem>Own Home</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Rent Apt/Home (Not Government Housing)</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Government Housing</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Section 8 Housing</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Parents</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Relative</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Boyfriend</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Boyfriend's Family</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Friend</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>With Different People at Different Times</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem>Homeless</ComboBoxItem> <ComboBoxItem Tag="OtherHousing">Other</ComboBoxItem> </ComboBox> </Grid> <Grid> <Grid.Style> <Style> <Setter Property="Label.Visibility" Value="Collapsed"></Setter> <Style.Triggers> <DataTrigger Binding="{Binding ElementName=HousingLocation, Path=SelectedItem.Tag}" Value="OtherHousing"> <Setter Property="Label.Visibility" Value="Visible"></Setter> </DataTrigger> </Style.Triggers> </Style> </Grid.Style> <Label>Specify Housing:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> </StackPanel> </GroupBox> </Paragraph> </StackPanel> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=College, Path=IsChecked, Converter={StaticResource BooleanToVisibilityConverter}}"> <Grid> <Label>Status:</Label> <ComboBox> </StackPanel>--> </Grid> <Grid> <Label>Location:</Label> <TextBox/> </Grid> <StackPanel Visibility="{Binding ElementName=Attending, Path=IsSelected, Converter={StaticResource
